mapper.insert: insert into o_shop_cart (SHOP_CART_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, SESSION_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_SN, GOODS_NAME, CART_TYPE, GOODS_AMOUNT, MARKET_PRICE, SHOP_PRICE, REAL_BUY_PRICE, IS_OPEN_SALE, PARENT_GOODS_ID, IS_GIFT, CAN_HANDLE, ADD_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, GOODS_ATTR ) values (#{shopCartId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cartType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realBuyPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOpenSale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{parentGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isGift,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{canHandle,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsAttr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update o_shop_cart set CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SESSION_ID = #{sessionId,jdbcType=CHAR}, GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_SN = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CART_TYPE = #{cartType,jdbcType=BIT}, GOODS_AMOUNT = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MARKET_PRICE = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOP_PRICE = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REAL_BUY_PRICE = #{realBuyPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_OPEN_SALE = #{isOpenSale,jdbcType=BIT}, PARENT_GOODS_ID = #{parentGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_GIFT = #{isGift,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CAN_HANDLE = #{canHandle,jdbcType=BIT}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GOODS_ATTR = #{goodsAttr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SHOP_CART_ID = #{shopCartId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SHOP_CART_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, SESSION_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_SN, GOODS_NAME, CART_TYPE, GOODS_AMOUNT, MARKET_PRICE, SHOP_PRICE, REAL_BUY_PRICE, IS_OPEN_SALE, PARENT_GOODS_ID, IS_GIFT, CAN_HANDLE, ADD_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, GOODS_ATTR from o_shop_cart where SHOP_CART_ID = #{shopCartId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select SHOP_CART_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, SESSION_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_SN, GOODS_NAME, CART_TYPE, GOODS_AMOUNT, MARKET_PRICE, SHOP_PRICE, REAL_BUY_PRICE, IS_OPEN_SALE, PARENT_GOODS_ID, IS_GIFT, CAN_HANDLE, ADD_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, GOODS_ATTR from o_shop_cart
